017package org.microbean.type;
018
019import java.lang.annotation.Annotation;
020
021import java.lang.constant.Constable;
022import java.lang.constant.ConstantDesc;
023import java.lang.constant.DirectMethodHandleDesc;
024import java.lang.constant.DynamicConstantDesc;
025import java.lang.constant.MethodHandleDesc;
026import java.lang.constant.MethodTypeDesc;
027
028import java.lang.reflect.AnnotatedType;
029import java.lang.reflect.GenericDeclaration;
030import java.lang.reflect.TypeVariable;
031import java.lang.reflect.Type;
032
033import java.util.Optional;
034
035import java.util.function.Predicate;
036
037import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.BSM_INVOKE;
038import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_String;
039
040import static org.microbean.type.ConstantDescs.CD_GenericDeclaration;
041import static org.microbean.type.ConstantDescs.CD_TypeVariable;
042
043/**
044 * A {@link TypeVariable} implementation.
045 *
046 * @param <T> the kind of {@link GenericDeclaration} that this {@link
047 * DefaultTypeVariable} was declared by
048 *
049 * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson"
050 * target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
051 */
052public final class DefaultTypeVariable<T extends GenericDeclaration> implements Constable, TypeVariable<T> {
053
054
055  /*
056   * Instance fields.
057   */
058
059
060  private final int hashCode;
061
062  private final TypeVariable<? extends T> delegate;
063
064
065  /*
066   * Constructors.
067   */
068
069
070  /**
071   * Creates a new {@link DefaultTypeVariable}.
072   *
073   * @param other a {@link TypeVariable} providing important locating
074   * information; must not be {@code null}
075   *
076   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code other} is {@code null}
077   */
078  public DefaultTypeVariable(final TypeVariable<? extends T> other) {
079    this(other.getGenericDeclaration(), tv -> tv.getName().equals(other.getName()));
080  }
081
082  /**
083   * Creates a new {@link DefaultTypeVariable}.
084   *
085   * @param genericDeclaration a {@link GenericDeclaration} whose
086   * {@linkplain GenericDeclaration#getTypeParameters() type
087   * variables} will be inspected; must not be {@code null}
088   *
089   * @param name the value that the return value of an invocation of
090   * {@link TypeVariable#getName()} must have when invoked on a member
091   * of the array returned by an invocation of {@link
092   * GenericDeclaration#getTypeParameters()} on the supplied {@code
093   * genericDeclaration}; must not be {@code null}
094   *
095   * @exception NullPointerException if {@code genericDeclaration} is
096   * {@code null}
097   *
098   * @exception IllegalArgumentException if the supplied {@code name}
099   * identifies no {@link TypeVariable}s
100   */
101  public DefaultTypeVariable(final GenericDeclaration genericDeclaration, final String name) {
102    this(genericDeclaration, tv -> tv.getName().equals(name));
103  }
104
105  /**
106   * Creates a new {@link DefaultTypeVariable}.
107   *
108   * @param genericDeclaration a {@link GenericDeclaration} whose
109   * {@linkplain GenericDeclaration#getTypeParameters() type
110   * variables} will be inspected; must not be {@code null}
111   *
112   * @param predicate the {@link Predicate} that will identify the
113   * {@link TypeVariable} that this {@link DefaultTypeVariable} will
114   * wrap; must not be {@code null}
115   *
116   * @exception NullPointerException if either {@code
117   * genericDeclaration} or {@code predicate} is {@code null}
118   *
119   * @exception IllegalArgumentException if the supplied {@link
120   * Predicate} identifies no {@link TypeVariable}s
121   */
122  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
123  public DefaultTypeVariable(final GenericDeclaration genericDeclaration, final Predicate<? super TypeVariable<?>> predicate) {
124    super();
125    TypeVariable<? extends T> delegate = null;
126    for (final TypeVariable<?> tv : genericDeclaration.getTypeParameters()) {
127      if (predicate.test(tv)) {
128        delegate = (TypeVariable<? extends T>)tv;
129        break;
130      }
131    }
132    if (delegate == null) {
133      throw new IllegalArgumentException("genericDeclaration: " + genericDeclaration + "; predicate: " + predicate);
134    }
135    this.delegate = delegate;
136    this.hashCode = this.computeHashCode();
137  }
138
139
140  /*
141   * Instance methods.
142   */
143
144
145  /**
146   * Returns the {@link TypeVariable} this {@link DefaultTypeVariable}
147   * wraps.
148   *
149   * @return the {@link TypeVariable} this {@link DefaultTypeVariable}
150   * wraps; never {@code null}
151   *
152   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
153   *
154   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
155   * threads.
156   *
157   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
158   */
159  public final TypeVariable<? extends T> getDelegate() {
160    return this.delegate;
161  }
162
163  @Override // TypeVariable
164  public final String getName() {
165    return this.delegate.getName();
166  }
167
168  @Override // TypeVariable
169  public final T getGenericDeclaration() {
170    return this.delegate.getGenericDeclaration();
171  }
172
173  @Override // TypeVariable
174  public final Type[] getBounds() {
175    return this.delegate.getBounds();
176  }
177
178  @Override // AnnotatedElement
179  public final AnnotatedType[] getAnnotatedBounds() {
180    return this.delegate.getAnnotatedBounds();
181  }
182
183  @Override // AnnotatedElement
184  public final <T extends Annotation> T getAnnotation(final Class<T> annotationClass) {
185    return this.delegate.getAnnotation(annotationClass);
186  }
187
188  @Override // AnnotatedElement
189  public final Annotation[] getAnnotations() {
190    return this.delegate.getAnnotations();
191  }
192
193  @Override // AnnotatedElement
194  public final <T extends Annotation> T[] getAnnotationsByType(final Class<T> annotationClass) {
195    return this.delegate.getAnnotationsByType(annotationClass);
196  }
197
198  @Override // AnnotatedElement
199  public final Annotation[] getDeclaredAnnotations() {
200    return this.delegate.getDeclaredAnnotations();
201  }
202
203  @Override // AnnotatedElement
204  public final <T extends Annotation> T[] getDeclaredAnnotationsByType(final Class<T> annotationClass) {
205    return this.delegate.getDeclaredAnnotationsByType(annotationClass);
206  }
207
208  @Override // AnnotatedElement
209  public final <T extends Annotation> T getDeclaredAnnotation(final Class<T> annotationClass) {
210    return this.delegate.getDeclaredAnnotation(annotationClass);
211  }
212
213  @Override // AnnotatedElement
214  public final boolean isAnnotationPresent(final Class<? extends Annotation> annotationClass) {
215    return this.delegate.isAnnotationPresent(annotationClass);
216  }
217
218  @Override // Constable
219  public final Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> describeConstable() {
220    return JavaTypes.describeConstable(this.getDelegate());
221  }
222
223  @Override // Object
224  public final int hashCode() {
225    return this.hashCode;
226  }
227
228  private final int computeHashCode() {
229    return JavaTypes.hashCode(this.delegate);
230  }
231
232  @Override // Object
233  public final boolean equals(final Object other) {
234    if (other == this) {
235      return true;
236    } else if (other instanceof TypeVariable<?> tv) {
237      return JavaTypes.equals(this, tv);
238    } else {
239      return false;
240    }
241  }
242
243  @Override // Object
244  public final String toString() {
245    return JavaTypes.toString(this);
246  }
247
248  /**
249   * Returns a {@link DefaultTypeVariable} representing the supplied
250   * {@link TypeVariable}.
251   *
252   * <p>If the supplied {@link TypeVariable} is:</p>
253   *
254   * <ul>
255   *
256   * <li>{@code null}: {@code null} is returned</li>
257   *
258   * <li>an instance of {@link DefaultTypeVariable}: the supplied
259   * {@code type} is returned</li>
260   *
261   * <li>anything else: a new {@link DefaultTypeVariable} is returned</li>
262   *
263   * </ul>
264   *
265   * @param <T> the type of {@link GenericDeclaration} that declares
266   * the type variable
267   *
268   * @param type the {@link TypeVariable} in question; may be {@code
269   * null} in which case {@code null} will be returned
270   *
271   * @return a {@link DefaultTypeVariable}, or {@code null}
272   *
273   * @nullability This method may return {@code null}.
274   *
275   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
276   * threads.
277   *
278   * @idempotency This method is idempotent and deterministic.
279   */
280  public static final <T extends GenericDeclaration> DefaultTypeVariable<T> of(final TypeVariable<T> type) {
281    if (type == null) {
282      return null;
283    } else if (type instanceof DefaultTypeVariable<T> tv) {
284      return tv;
285    } else {
286      return new DefaultTypeVariable<>(type);
287    }
288  }
289
290}
